name: Toy Parade
text:
(This card is always treated as a "Frightfur" card.)
Target 1 of your DARK monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; this turn, you can only declare attacks with that monster, also each time it destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY, it can make another attack in a row. If you control a Fairy monster: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 4 or lower DARK monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Toy Parade" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
